tool_description: Crypto liquidation tracking and reporting system. Aggregate data from exchange like Binance, Bybit & OKX
name: Liquidation Report
title: Liquidation Report

api_list.name: Pro+
api_list.description: Suites of data tailored specifically for Lickhunter traders. Show liquidation value for Binance, Bybit & Okx.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://liquidation-report.p.rapidapi.com/lickhunterproplus"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "liquidation-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Report
api_list.description: Get the latest liquidation data from Binance, Bybit and OKX exchange. Data is limited to 10000 rows.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://liquidation-report.p.rapidapi.com/report"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "liquidation-report.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Data Analysis
api_list.description: Get the summary liquidation data for all coin. Data include total liquidation value, total liquidation amount, mean & median liquidation value.
